name: Squirtle

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Withdraw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Squirtle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

flavorText: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

strengths: Bubble offers energy-efficient damage with potential Paralysis disruption
Withdraw provides defensive capability to survive tough matchups
Evolves through Wartortle into the extremely powerful Blastoise
Low retreat cost of 1 allows flexible positioning
Strong against Fire-type Pokemon which are common in the format
weaknesses: Low 40 HP makes it vulnerable to one-hit knockouts
Lightning weakness is problematic against popular Electric Pokemon
Both Bubble's paralysis and Withdraw's protection rely on coin flips
No resistance to offset defensive vulnerabilities
Withdraw deals no damage, slowing down game progression
synergies: Evolve into Wartortle and then Blastoise for Rain Dance energy acceleration
Use Defender in combination with Withdraw for maximum damage prevention
Bubble's paralysis combines well with follow-up switches or additional disruption
Computer Search can help find Rare Candy for faster evolution paths
counters: Pikachu - Lightning weakness means Thunder Jolt is devastating
